directions: Preheat oven to 375°F. Combine garlic, rosemary and thyme in small bowl. Arrange chicken in large roasting pan Sprinkle chicken with salt and pepper. Rub with garlic mixture; drizzle with olive oil. Pour wine into bottom of pan. Bake chicken until just cooked through, about 30 minutes. Remove from oven.
Preheat broiler. Broil chicken until skin browns, about 3 minutes. Transfer chicken to platter and serve.
ingredients: 6 large chicken breast halves with skin and bones
title: Herb-Roasted Chicken Breasts
